page.description: Retrieves a directory of files within a folder on the server.
page.prototype: .ListDirectory as L (BYREF Listing as C, TargetPath as C [, GetDetails as L = .f.])

argument.name: Listing
argument.description: The contents of the listing returned by the server.

argument.name: TargetPath
argument.description: The target path to retrieve a directory listing for.

argument.name: GetDetails
argument.description: Default = *[xb:.f.]*. Determines whether a simple list is returned or a more detailed listing of the contents is returned.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.t.]* if the operation succeed. Otherwise, returns *[xb:.f.]*. If an error occurred, the *[xb:INET::FTP CallResult]* property will contain more information.

page.example:
dim ftp as INET::FTP ftp.UserName = "Fred" ftp.Password = "Secret" ftp.EnableSSL = .t. ftp.Host = "ftp.myserver.com" ftp.UsePassive = .t.
dim Listing as C if ftp.ListDirectory(Listing, "/downloads", .f.) <> .t. ' error msg = ftp.callResult.error ... end if
